KMSmicro_v5_0_1_RU_EN_ES_by_Ratiborus

KMSmicro 5.0.1 
The local KMS server to activate Windows 7 - 8.1, Office 2010-2013 VL editions 
This program does not activate Retail editions.

Features:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Counters activate KMS-server screwed on startup.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Time / date KMS server is synchronized with the startup time / date 
the host computer.

Note:	
CCM server starts to activate when called upon for the activation of more
than 25 computers. Then, since it starts the computer 26 to activate it. 
Less than 25 computers there will be no activation.

In KMSmicro the address is 127.0.0.1-127.0.0.254 (localhost), port 1688.
KMSmicro has access to the Internet for time synchronization.
